header_text: You've recently been feeling overwhelmed with work, but you know that you need to get a second job to be in a more stable financial situation. While searching online for jobs, you saw an application for a job that sounds really fun for you. You think that working this second job will be manageable.

elements.Text: Do you think you'll thrive with a second job?
